documents.document: An army officer owns a magnet that allows him to love everything in Utah at the same time.
A grandmother is aroused by the thought of labyrinths.
Solve this mystery: A monk is found murdered in a circus tent. Beside him is an animated GIF and a hat.
A goblin from the future appears at the coronation of a Kurdish emperor. It destroys him.
A sentient scrotum walks the streets of Berlin. It has come to steal electronic dance music.
An ambassador buys a tiny crystal which allows him to become a waterfall.
A Tunisian psychiatrist invents a new kind of arithmetic based on the movement of fireworks.
A philosopher is blowing her nose. Suddenly her nose turns into a gramophone.
A poet sees a birthmark in the shape of a porcelain doll.
A secretary realises that the afternoon is controlling random numbers.
A rabbi possesses a unique skill: He can sense the presence of lightning bolts.
By eating a chocolate chip cookie, you can reach another dimension. It is filled with milkshakes and snowmen.
A beautiful woman plays a game of checkers with a maze.
A witch believes it is her destiny to kill motherhood.
A dental hygienist is reading a history of China which describes a war against clowns that took place in 2323 BC.
A Welsh senator rides her horse into a haunted palace. When she emerges, she realises she is an entrepreneur from Topeka.
A safety deposit box in Calcutta contains alcoholism.
On All Hallow's Eve every man and woman in Birmingham is replaced by sharks.
Last night I dreamt about a koala whispering in a mountain.
There is a secret department in Twitter that is researching how to generate feelings of pride.
A caliph wishes to befriend every carrot in Mexico City.
A duchess hears of a lighthouse inside a tropical island, and plans to visit it.
A stonemason is checking Grindr inside a galaxy.
A coral reef appears above Wisconsin. An accountant is talking to it.
Thirteen college professors plan to create a world where everything is cupcakes.
A stomach made of insomnia appears in Constantinople.
A mathematician finds a leather-bound book containing instructions for building a merry-go-round out of mountain ranges.
An Ethiopian philosophical treatise describes a piece of rose quartz that gives you power over reality.
There is a 16th century Spartan prophecy that you will forget a Stradivarius violin.
In Athens there is a polar bear that is covered in religion instead of fur.
One night a message is written in the sky in hailstones. It reads: "Read more Hegel."
An Austrian king passes a law against icebergs.
A cold-hearted boy falls in love with veganism.
Tonight you will dream of a chocolate chip cookie. Inside the chocolate chip cookie is an icicle. Inside the icicle is your heart's desire.
A fortune teller turns over a tarot card with a condom on it. 'Your destiny is to become a novelist,' he says to you.
A panda bear can move shooting stars with its mind.
A queen looks at Leonardo's Last Supper and sees her dog in the background.
A Mongolian busboy is eating ice cream cones.
Three hundred theologians do battle against a garden.
A historian becomes rich by selling arthouse films.
A court jester realises that he is a house of mirrors. Life goes on as normal.
In Baghdad there is a monkey which likes to drink gin.
A Norwegian angel introduces a law that everyone must adopt a dingo.
An Irish philosopher is writing a PhD thesis about the philosophy of Kant.
You receive the memories of Billie Holiday.
A dreadnought falls into a swimming pool filled with boiling water.
There is a volcano in Shanghai that feels insane.
A city is haunted by the ghost of a congressman. He keeps repeating an odd phrase: "The sexually frustrated candy apple is playing chess."
A Hungarian board of directors has a meeting about arts funding that continues for 281 billion years.
In Siberia there is an undertaker who has a compass instead of a testicle.
A eunuch discovers that society is under the spell of a universe.
A forest enjoys reading the philosophy of Heidegger.
An opera singer receives a strange gift from her mother: An invisible mango tree.
A time traveller jumps from the Battle of the Somme to the present. He hands you a rhinoceros and says: "Relax."
You are spirited away to Indonesia. There you start a new life as an HR manager.
A mystical book describes a man made of Big Macs.
A Fijian sorceress photographs the end of the world.
A mermaid has the power to transport you to a concert hall in Detroit.
A bat and a vicar are falling out of love.
A novelist discovers that racism does not exist, and is secretly pleased.
A palace goes to a costume party dressed as a dinosaur fossil.
A fisherman belches. In that time, he lives for seven years as a bed bug.
A crocodile made of glass is born in Miami.
A politician is chewing gum in a mechanical forest.
A stone has the power to enable caterpillars to fly.
A Ukrainian necromancer hears of a cathedral located inside a desert, and immediately sets out to find it.
A novelist devotes her life to making a list of every murder that has taken place in St Petersburg.
A tampon falls from the sky. It has escaped from a church in Reno.
An office manager suddenly turns into a windchime. Ashamed, she flees to Kyoto.
An anthropologist gets married to Leonardo DiCaprio inside a glass island.
A Burmese solicitor plants a seed. A cemetery grows from it.
A clairvoyant turns over a tarot card with a broomstick on it. 'Beware of opals,' he says to you.
A tuxedo causes anyone who wears it to turn into a swimming pool.
A carpenter gets drunk with a silver temple.
A Czechoslovakian steamship is sailing on a sea of bloodlust.
You will dream of a custard apple tonight. The custard apple will sell you.
There is a medieval Latvian prophecy that you will play a game of dominoes with a dictionary.
A poet owns a notebook by Nietzsche on the subject of long division.
A committee of professors imagine a Coliseum into existence.
A Madagascan emperor hatches a plan to strangle homosexuality.
In Vermont there is a snowman which is buying a used car.
You suddenly turn into Paris.
A guilt-stricken princess receives a christening gift from an angel: 19 butterflies.
A Sudanese poet realises that her baby is a glass library.
A lizard holds up a jewellery store. It steals 13 pearls, a topaz and a magic magnetic device.
There is a drug dealer in Bangkok who can get you high on paradoxes.
A girl sinks into a lagoon filled with lemon juice.
A Catalan eunuch proposes marriage to Black Friday.
A Somali baron goes for a walk in a golden maze. When he emerges, he realises he is a porn star from Tampa.
A shaman makes a fortune trading in sleeping in.
A deeply depressed butler falls into a pool filled with lust. A salamander jumps in to rescue him.
A record producer owns a pair of binoculars that give him complete understanding of information.
An admiral sees an island in the shape of a Fabergé egg.
A 40-year-old undertaker falls in love with time travel.
There is a beach in Varanasi that is infinitely long.
A tiger whispers to a senator: "I wish I was a lime tree."
A detective novel in which the killer is revealed to be a city.
A hairdresser is cutting up pumpkins in a shopping mall. He is thinking about snowdomes. There is a seahorse standing right behind him.
An HR manager turns into every monster in Venice.
A sous chef switches bodies with a genie.
